head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KUHEL, RONALD J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KUHEL, RONALD J.

block.p: KUHEL-Ronald J. In San Francisco, October 25th, 1998. Beloved companion of Seth Ira Chodosh; loved brother of Gerald Kuhel and Suzanne Igler; also survived by six nieces & nephews and one greatnephew. A Requiem Mass of the Resurrection will be celebrated at 2:00PM Saturday, October 31, 1998 at the Church of the Advent of Christ the King, 261 Fell Street, San Francisco. Memorials to the AIDS Emergency Fund or Hospice by the Bay preferred. Memorial in New York to be announced.
